title: Russian soldier Vadim Shishimarin sentenced to life in prison in Ukraine's first war crimes trial since invasion
content:
1. Russian soldier Vadim Shishimarin sentenced to life in prison in Ukraine's first war crimes trial since invasion  CBS News
  2. Ukrainian Court Finds Russian Soldier Guilty Of Killing Unarmed Civilian  NBC News
  3. Russian soldier sentenced to life in prison in Ukraine conflict's first war crimes trial  CNN
  4. Ukraine war crimes trial: Russian soldier sentenced to life in prison for killing civilian  Fox News
  5. Russian Soldier Sentenced to Life in Prison in Ukraine War-Crimes Trial  The Wall Street Journal

localize.title: ロシア兵Vadim Shishimarinに終身刑の判決、ウクライナ侵攻後初の戦争犯罪裁判に
俄罗斯士兵瓦迪姆-希希马林在乌克兰入侵以来的首次战争罪审判中被判处终身监禁
俄羅斯士兵瓦迪姆-希希馬林在烏克蘭入侵以來的首次戰爭罪審判中被判處終身監禁
